text: Pier Angeli (19 June 193210 September 1971) was an Italian actress. She was known for her role in the 1951 movie Teresa, for which she won a Golden Globe Award. She had one son with Vic Damone, her first husband, and another son with Armando Trovajoli, her second husband. She was born in Cagliari, Sardinia. She had a twin sister actress Marisa Pavan. Angeli overdosed with barbiturate on 10 September 1971 at her home in Beverly Hills, California at the age of 39. ==References== Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1932 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Drug-related deaths in the United States Category:Twin people Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:People from Cagliari
